skills.name: Hammer Punch
skills.description: Attacks the enemy 2 times and deals damage proportionate to your Defense. Each attack has a 25% chance to stun the enemy for 1 turn. If the target is not suffering any harmful effects, 1 additional attack is added.
skills.level_progress_description:
Effect Rate +5%
Damage +5%
Effect Rate +5%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +15%

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skill_effect.name: Stun
skill_effect.description: Enemy is stunned and immobilized for a number of turns

skills.name: Body Press
skills.description: Crushes all enemies and decreases the Attack Bar of each enemy by 30%. The damage of this attack is proportionate to your MAX HP and Defense.

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skills.multiplier_formula: 0.15*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark> + 1.25*<mark>DEF</mark>

skills.name: Pound
skills.description: Attacks the enemy 4 times and deals damage proportionate to your Defense. 2 additional attacks are added if the enemy's MAX HP is lower than yours and if the target is suffering a harmful effect.

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.
